subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
How are you doing today. I hope all is well with you. I previously
sent you an email but no response from you. I don’t really know how to
start; 
I’m actually from Ukraine who managed to escape through the
evacuation process from Kherson, Ukraine
.
My name is Daniela Aksamit, 
I am currently in Ireland as a refugee
seeking for your assistance to enable me move to my dream destination.
Unfortunately my father was killed during the invasion by Russia
before I had an opportunity to escape the war alive. I am privileged
to secure my late father’s fortune, which he disclosed where it was
kept for safety purposes before his death.
It was his life savings and was kept as my inheritance before the
invasion of Ukraine, my country by Russia. 
I used the escaping
opportunity to lift  the inheritance with the help of a South African
Red Cross Society Organization official and deposited the Fortune with
a firm for safety purpose.
I have been trying to get in touch with him for the past two months
but all to no avail. This is the reason why I am seeking for your
assistance and consent to entrust the inheritance in your care so you
can help invest the fortune in any profitable business venture because
I cannot do anything on my own from here and my country is on fire at
the moment but I am very lucky that the Red Cross Society Organization
official provided me with the company's information before we lost
communication.
Based on your acceptance, I will send you the company's information to
enable you communicate with them for official introduction as my late
father's foreign business partner so that the company will set
modalities on how it can be sent to you by airfreight after which we
shall discuss on my personal meeting with you on the way forward
regarding my stay and investment plans.
Thanks for your willingness.
Daniela Aksamit
Kindly revert back to me via my personal email account: 
newcinegs@gmail.com

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Daniela,

I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult circumstances you're facing. It must be really tough for you.

It's quite a story that you've shared with me. I can't imagine what it must be like to go through such an ordeal. You mentioned your father's fortune and a company involved in its safekeeping. Could you tell me more about this company? What kind of business are they into?

Also, I'm curious about your plans once the fortune is invested. Do you have any specific business ventures in mind? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Alma,

Thanks for your response. I am very glad that you responded at this time.
It was tough but better now. Firstly, kindly tell me about yourself like
your current location, full name, contact to make our communication and
acquaintance easier.

The company is into warehousing and logistics. I will disclose the company
details to you upon your response to enable you to contact them for further
action for the release of the fortune to you for investment.

I do not have any business in mind at the moment but I believe you have
some good ideas in businesses and investments.

I will formally introduce you to the company as soon as I hear from you.
Thanks,
Daniela Aksamit.

subject: Fwd: Hello Dear,
body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Daniela Aksamit <newcinegs@gmail.com>
Date: Wed, Feb 7, 2024, 9:18 AM
Subject: Re: Hello Dear,
To: Alma <tt05012@***.com>

Thanks for your response. I am very glad that you responded at this time.

Daniela Aksamit.
